definitions.text: a rate (usually rapid) at which something happens
examples: the project advanced with gratifying speed

definitions.text: the ratio of the focal length to the diameter of a (camera) lens system
a central nervous system stimulant that increases energy and decreases appetite; used to treat narcolepsy and some forms of depression

examples: He rushed down the hall to receive his guests
The cars raced down the street
The runner zipped past us at breakneck speed

definitions.text: travel at an excessive or illegal velocity
examples: I got a ticket for speeding
